definition: Huaiyang county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan
name of a river
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Huaiyang county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan

sentences.english: Beihuaiyang basin and range structural belt is an important part of Dabie orogenic belt.
sentences.chinese: 北淮陽盆嶺構造帶是大別造山帶的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Fuxi lived here 6500 years ago and set the capital in this city.
sentences.chinese: 伏羲生活在年前並在淮陽建都。

sentences.english: Jiangsu Cuisine, also called Huaiyang Cuisine, is popular in the lower reach of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇菜，又叫淮陽菜，在長江下游很受歡迎。

sentences.english: When we got to Huaiyang county, we first went to Taihao tomb.
sentences.chinese: 當我們到達淮陽時，我們首先去參觀了太昊陵。
